page.title: 03OUR SCHOOLS
page.content: There are two primary schools in our area,one is at Burlescombe and the other is at Holcombe Rogus.At Burlescombe School there are 55 pupils.There are 2 classes,Mrs.Edwards is the headteacher and Mrs.Topley takes the infants.At Holcombe Rogus we have 42 pupils.The headmaster is Mr.Curtis and Mrs.MacLean teaches the Infants. The children from Westleigh go to Burlescombe School while the children from Hockworthy and Staple Cross come to our school at Holcombe Rogus.Both of these schools are Church Schools.There are playgroups in both Holcombe Rogus and Burlescombe.When we are 11 years old,we go to Uffculme School which is 7 miles away.All of our schools belong to the Culm Valley group of schools.
